metadata.title: CVE-2024-5435 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered discovered in GitLab EE/CE affecting allversions starting from 15.10 before 17.1.7, all versions starting from 17.2before 17.2.5, all versions starting from 17.3 before 17.3.2 will discloseuser password from repository mirror configuration.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
